name: Nat.dist_eq
initialProofState:
x y : Nat
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist x y) (abs (HSub.hSub ↑x ↑y))
decl: theorem dist_eq (x y : ℕ) : dist x y = |(x : ℝ) - y| := rfl

name: Nat.dist_coe_int
initialProofState:
x y : Nat
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist ↑x ↑y) (Dist.dist x y)
decl: theorem dist_coe_int (x y : ℕ) : dist (x : ℤ) (y : ℤ) = dist x y := rfl

name: Nat.dist_cast_real
initialProofState:
x y : Nat
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist ↑x ↑y) (Dist.dist x y)
decl:
@[norm_cast, simp]
theorem dist_cast_real (x y : ℕ) : dist (x : ℝ) y = dist x y := rfl

name: Nat.pairwise_one_le_dist
initialProofState: ⊢ Pairwise fun m n => LE.le 1 (Dist.dist m n)
decl:
theorem pairwise_one_le_dist : Pairwise fun m n : ℕ => 1 ≤ dist m n := fun _ _ hne =>
  Int.pairwise_one_le_dist <| mod_cast hne

name: Nat.isUniformEmbedding_coe_real
decl:
theorem isUniformEmbedding_coe_real : IsUniformEmbedding ((↑) : ℕ → ℝ) :=
  isUniformEmbedding_bot_of_pairwise_le_dist zero_lt_one pairwise_one_le_dist

name: Nat.isClosedEmbedding_coe_real
decl:
theorem isClosedEmbedding_coe_real : IsClosedEmbedding ((↑) : ℕ → ℝ) :=
  isClosedEmbedding_of_pairwise_le_dist zero_lt_one pairwise_one_le_dist

name: Nat.preimage_ball
initialProofState:
x : Nat
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage Nat.cast (Metric.ball (↑x) r)) (Metric.ball x r)
decl: theorem preimage_ball (x : ℕ) (r : ℝ) : (↑) ⁻¹' ball (x : ℝ) r = ball x r := rfl

name: Nat.preimage_closedBall
initialProofState:
x : Nat
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage Nat.cast (Metric.closedBall (↑x) r)) (Metric.closedBall x r)
decl: theorem preimage_closedBall (x : ℕ) (r : ℝ) : (↑) ⁻¹' closedBall (x : ℝ) r = closedBall x r := rfl

name: Nat.closedBall_eq_Icc
initialProofState:
x : Nat
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Metric.closedBall x r) (Set.Icc (Nat.ceil (HSub.hSub (↑x) r)) (Nat.floor (HAdd.hAdd (↑x) r)))
decl:
theorem closedBall_eq_Icc (x : ℕ) (r : ℝ) : closedBall x r = Icc ⌈↑x - r⌉₊ ⌊↑x + r⌋₊ := by
  rcases le_or_lt 0 r with (hr | hr)
  · rw [← preimage_closedBall, Real.closedBall_eq_Icc, preimage_Icc]
    exact add_nonneg (cast_nonneg x) hr
  · rw [closedBall_eq_empty.2 hr, Icc_eq_empty_of_lt]
    calc ⌊(x : ℝ) + r⌋₊ ≤ ⌊(x : ℝ)⌋₊ := floor_mono <| by linarith
    _ < ⌈↑x - r⌉₊ := by
      rw [floor_natCast, Nat.lt_ceil]
      linarith

name: Nat.instProperSpace
decl:
instance : ProperSpace ℕ :=
  ⟨fun x r => by
    rw [closedBall_eq_Icc]
    exact (Set.finite_Icc _ _).isCompact⟩

name: Nat.instNoncompactSpace
decl:
instance : NoncompactSpace ℕ :=
  noncompactSpace_of_neBot <| by simp [Filter.atTop_neBot]
